name: Hello, Goodbye
description: "Toubu Kaito" That is the fake name assumed by a young military officer from the United Provinces of Japan. He has been tasked with infiltrating Tenshudo Academy, located in Special District Morino, impersonating a transfer student. He is to cast aside his former identity, and 'become' Toubu Kaito.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows XP or newer 处理器: 1.3 GHz 内存: 512 MB RAM 存储空间: 需要 3 GB 可用空间
